name: MATH (Mathematics Aptitude Test of Heuristics)
summary: A dataset of 12,500 challenging high school competition math problems with step-by-step solutions.
notes: Problems are sourced from competitions like AMC 10, AMC 12, and AIME, covering topics such as algebra, geometry, number theory, and calculus. Each problem includes a detailed solution, facilitating training and evaluation of mathematical reasoning models.
